byline.contributor: María Eugenia Díaz contributed reporting from Caracas, Venezuela.

abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez declares that he has beaten cancer less than five months after he stunned Venezuelans by revealing that he had undergone emergency surgery to remove tumor while in seclusion in Cuba.
snippet: The Venezuelan president made the announcement Thursday, less than five months after revealing that he had undergone emergency surgery to remove a tumor while in seclusion in Cuba.
lead_paragraph: The Venezuelan president made the announcement Thursday, less than five months after revealing that he had undergone emergency surgery to remove a tumor while in seclusion in Cuba.

headline.main: Hugo Chávez Says His Cancer Is Gone
headline.print_headline: Chávez Says He Has Beaten His Cancer
headline.seo: Hugo Chávez Tells Venezuelans His Cancer Is Gone
